tossup_question: -   –  What type of scattering generally involves the elastic scattering of electromagnetic radiation by a free charged particle and generally occurs as long as the incident photon energy is much less than the mass energy of the particle?
bonus_question: -  PHYSICS –  A spherical grain of sand falls into a pool. As the grain falls through the water, its terminal velocity is independent of which of the following?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) The temperature of the water
X) The radius of the grain
Y) The density of the grain
Z) The height above the pool from which it fell
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Z) The height above the pool from which it fell
